tool_description: Analyzes current warehouse capacity including staffing, equipment availability, and processing capacity for order fulfillment.

warehouse_ids.description: List of warehouse identifiers to analyze

target_date.description: Target processing date for capacity check

order_complexity.description: Order complexity level: simple, standard, or complex

error_messages: Invalid warehouse ID: One or more warehouse identifiers are not recognized.
Invalid target date: Date must be in ISO 8601 format and not in the past.
Invalid complexity level: Must be one of: simple, standard, complex.
Capacity data unavailable: Unable to retrieve current capacity information for specified warehouses.
usage: Provide warehouse_ids array and target_date for capacity analysis. Optionally specify order_complexity to get more accurate capacity estimates.

capacity_summary.description: Overall capacity assessment across requested warehouses

warehouse_capacities.description: Capacity details per warehouse in format 'warehouse_id:utilization_percentage:available_slots'

recommended_warehouses.description: Warehouses with optimal capacity for the request
